intro: Craft your legacy from battle and stone.
description:
Step into the world of Palland, a captivating survival, building, and exploration game where everything starts with a humble base. In a vast and dangerous environment, you decide how to gather resources, expand your shelter, and deal with wild creatures that can be both threats and valuable sources of power. 

- Build bases across three distinct maps: Each environment offers unique challenges, construction styles, and local resources. 
- Explore and gather essential materials: From rare crystals to vital essences – every item counts on your path to growth. 
- Survival management: Balance your character’s health, hunger, and energy to stay alive.
- Quest-driven gameplay: Follow dynamic missions that guide your progress, offer rewards, and unlock new possibilities. 

Palland delivers a rich and immersive experience where base-building, combat, exploration, and evolution blend into one dynamic and strategic journey.
